<?php

class Developer {
    public string $name;
    public array $skills;
    public array $interests;
    
    public function __construct(string $name, array $skills, array $interests) {
        $this->name = $name;
        $this->skills = $skills;
        $this->interests = $interests;
    }
}

class TechStack {
    public array $devOps;
    public array $backend;
    public array $frontend;
    
    public function __construct(array $devOps, array $backend, array $frontend) {
        $this->devOps = $devOps;
        $this->backend = $backend;
        $this->frontend = $frontend;
    }
}

$techStack = new TechStack(
    devOps: [
        'GitHub',
        'Cloudflare',
        'Docker'
    ],
    frontend: [
        'JavaScript',
        'TypeScript',
        'TailwindCSS',
        'Astro',
        'Svelte',
        'React',
        'Markdown'
    ],
    backend: [
        'Laravel',
        'Filament',
        'Bun',
        'PHP',
        'Redis',
        'SQLite',
        'PostgreSQL'
    ]
);

// Developer profile
$me = new Developer(
    name: 'Jorge Thomas',
    skills: array_merge(
        $techStack->devOps,
        $techStack->backend,
        $techStack->frontend
    ),
    interests: [
        'Open Source',
        'Security',
        'Privacy',
        'Performance',
        'Self-Hosting',
        'Networking'
    ]
);

// Contact function
function contact(string $type): string {
    return match($type) {
        'github' => 'https://github.com/akrista',
        'linkedIn' => 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/akrista',
        'email' => 'info@notakrista.com',
        default => 'Send a message.'
    };
}

?>

Let's Build Something Great Together

🇻🇪 Venezuelan full-stack developer passionate about creating robust web solutions with modern infrastructure. I help businesses, startups, and individuals build scalable applications, optimize workflows, and leverage self-hosted technologies.

🚀 What I Offer

🐳 Docker & Containerization

Scalable container orchestration and microservices architecture for modern applications.

⚡ Laravel & Filament Development

Full-stack web applications with sleek admin panels and robust backend systems.

🗄️ PostgreSQL Optimization

Database design, query optimization, and performance tuning for high-traffic applications.

🏠 Self-Hosting & Infrastructure

Custom homelab setups, private cloud solutions, and infrastructure automation.

🔒 Security & Performance Audits

Make your applications faster, more secure, and reliable with comprehensive reviews.

🎯 Technical Consulting

Architecture decisions, technology stack recommendations, and best practices guidance.

💡 Why Work With Me?
